messages.messageBody:

>>
>> Helen
>
>I am aware that this is not a support group.
>
>I didn't say this was a support group. I presume, however, that most of the

Aw, Ned... are we going to get into nit-picking now?

Helen

messages.subject: Re: 2282 - truancy
messages.msgSnippet: on 8/24/02 2:57 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at ... I am aware that this is not a support group. I didn t say this was a support group. I presume,
messages.messageBody:
on 8/24/02 2:57 PM, Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com at
Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com wrote:

> Subject: Re:Fines for Truancy ?
>
> At 1:55 PM -0400 8/24/02, Luz Shosie and Ned Vare wrote:
>> PS Such an outrageous situation as this needs to be challenged. What are
>> support groups for, if not this?
>
> So isn't there a local support group challenging this outrageous
> situtation? If not, why not start one?
>
> This isn't a support group, it's a discussion list. Pretty big difference.
>
> Helen

I am aware that this is not a support group.

I didn't say this was a support group. I presume, however, that most of the
listers are members of them, some in the state that levies fines for
non-attendance of school.

I also did not suggest that anyone on this list should do the challenging.

I also did not bring up the subject of the fines for truancy or the new
threat in CA. I am participating in the existing discussions. NV
